name: The Milkweed Seed
description:
Milkweed--without it, the Monarch butterfly could not exist. 
As its pod matures and starts to point up, it opens, presenting it's seeds to the wind~

Captured here in this PEACE, there is one tiny seed, and each fine filament is beautifully preserved. You'll never be without your butterfly.

This listing is for the 1" magnetic Milkweed PEACE. Jewelry is sold separately. This PEACE will fit into any of your 1" PEACES Jewelry. The price for the complete set shown here (eyelet pendant on a 30" white/silver beaded necklace) is $40. Message me if you want to place an order for the complete set. Thanks!

PeacesByCJ@gmail.com

name: "Finding Beauty" PEACES necklace by artist Barbara Schneider
description:
Strongly influenced by the Japanese concept of Wabi-Sabi, Barbara interprets natural images through cloth, paint, dye and thread.

Her studio at the Starline Factory in Harvard is filled with her creative quilted visions. 

PEACES is featuring one of Barbara's quilts on this magnetic insert. It hangs on a 24" copper chain and comes with one extra PEACE as a gift!

name: Courage
description:
In a world once filled with intense and frequent fires, it was the hardiest of trees that survived...the oaks. This sparkling little bronzed bur oak leaf will remind you that you are also a survivor!

Captured in this one-inch magnetic insert, it fits perfectly into the copper pendant and hangs from a 24" chain.

All PEACES inserts are easily interchangeable with all PEACES jewelry. Bracelets coming soon!

name: "Robin's Nest" PEACES necklace by artist Ruth Chou Simons
description:
Who can resist peeking into a little nest in the spring? Your heart skips a beat when you find it's occupied.

Captured in this Peaces necklace, artist Ruth Chou Simons' "Robin's Nest" will bring a smile to your face.

PEACES are magnetic inserts with a felt backing cap, easily interchangeable. They snap on and off the copper necklace in a breeze. Each comes with a 24" copper ball and chain necklace and one extra PEACE as a gift!

"Everything that truly matters in life requires heart and soul. It requires passion and perseverance." -Follow artist Ruth Chou Simons' blog at www.GraceLaced.com
